title: Supreme Martial Dao - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Xuanhuan
tags: Artifacts   Beast Companions   Bloodlines   Bullying   Clan Building   Determined Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Male Protagonist   Spirit Advisor   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Underestimated Protagonist   Weak to Strong
author: Night Quiet War   暗夜幽殇
description:
With a breath left, Hope is immortal.

Possessing Martial God bloodline, shouldering great responsibility,
carrying the clan’s enmity, with his dreams, Wang Chen treads on the Martial path.

Killing enemies, searching for the Martial Dao, his name moves the whole world. Leading the clan, leading the declining sect, he begins his journey, welcoming challenge after challenges. The path to his aspirations is full of difficulties and endless slaughters.

Let us see how he overcomes his challenges. With the Martial God bloodline, the sovereign descends the world! With Supreme body, reaching for the Heaven!>
